website_summaries.verdict: An anti-frizz oil in an easy, no-mess bottle that’s just as effective as more expensive alternatives. Can act as a daily, low-maintenance hair smoother on bad weather days.
pros: This serum goes on like an oil with gel tendencies, avoiding the oily nature that many anti-frizz oils take on
Penetrates dehydrated locks even in 97% humidity, with an argan oil base
Users rave about the scent and de-frizzing abilities, especially during styling
cons: Some users find that when they apply the product after they brush towel-dry damp hair, it can be less effective, so try applying before you brush

product_meta.title: Garnier Fructis Sleek & Shine Anti-Frizz Serum, Frizzy, Dry, Unmanageable Hair, 5.1 fl. oz.
product_meta.description:
Fructis Sleek & Shine Anti-Frizz Serum with Argan Oil from Morocco soaks into frizzy, dry, unmanageable hair for lasting smoothness and shine. • Get instant sleek with Sleek and Shine shampoo, conditioner and leave-in treatment • Hair serum with Argan Oil from Morocco • Soaks into frizzy, dry, unmanageable hair for lasting smoothness and shine • Long lasting frizz control *With shampoo, conditioner and leave-in treatment. It’s more than Argan Oil… it’s a fortifying smoother for long lasting frizz control. Paraben-free Sleek & Shine shampoo, conditioner and leave-in treatments help smooth each strand for long lasting frizz control. Even in 97% humidity.* *With shampoo, conditioner and leave-in treatment. After using Sleek & Shine shampoo and conditioner, dispense 1 pump of serum, or as much as needed for your hair type, into your hands. Apply uniformly to damp or dry hair. Do not rinse. For the sleekest look, style using brush and blow dryer.

BRAND STORY
By Garnier Fructis

FIGHT FRIZZ WITH SLEEK AND SHINE: Tame your frizz with styling sprays, creams, and mists that give your look a lasting sleek and smooth finish.

NOURISH AND STYLE WITH GARNIER FRUCTIS: From Mega-Full to Anti-Frizz hair products Garnier has shampoos, leave-in conditioners, hair masks, texturizing sprays and more to help you care for your hair your way.
OVER 100 YEARS OF PIONEERING IN HAIR CARE: Since 1904 Garnier has blended naturally inspired & derived ingredients into breakthrough formulas. Nourish your hair with hair color & care from Garnier.
INSPIRED BY NATURE: Garnier carries an array of products for your hair & skin care needs, from shampoos, color care & styling products to formulas that cleanse, moisturize & repair skin
